info.title: PhoneNumbersClient
info.description: The 10DLC program enables A2P SMS messaging for Local US numbers.

put.summary: Creates or replace an attachment on a 10DLC US Campaign Brief.

parameters.name: campaignId
parameters.description: Campaign Brief Id. Must be a valid GUID

parameters.name: attachmentId
parameters.description: Attachment Id. Must be a valid GUID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Data to create or replace a Campaign Brief File Attachment

get.summary: Gets a specific attachment from a 10DLC US Campaign Brief.

parameters.name: campaignId
parameters.description: Campaign Brief Id. Must be a valid GUID

parameters.name: attachmentId
parameters.description: Attachment Id. Must be a valid GUID

delete.summary: Deletes a specific attachment from a 10DLC US Campaign Brief.

parameters.name: campaignId
parameters.description: Campaign Brief Id. Must be a valid GUID

parameters.name: attachmentId
parameters.description: Attachment Id. Must be a valid GUID

get.summary: Gets the list of attachments from a 10DLC US Campaign Brief.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to skip, for pagination purposes.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes.

put.summary: Sets the 10DLC configuration of a phone number.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: Phone number to be updated, e.g. +11234567890.

202.description: The service has accepted the request and will start processing later. It will return 'Accepted' immediately and include an 'Operation-Location' and 'Location' headers. Client side should further query the operation status using the URL specified in 'Operation-Location' header. When operation completes successfully query final result using URL specified in 'Location' header.

Location.description: URL to retrieve the final result after operation completes.

Operation-Location.description: URL to query for status of the operation.

get.summary: Gets the 10DLC configuration of a phone number.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: Phone number to be updated, e.g. +11234567890.

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of eligible 10DLC costs with pagination.
get.description: This method supports pagination via the "skip" and "top" query parameters.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip in the result set (default: 0).

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return in the result set (default: 100).

200.description: Returns the paginated collection of eligible 10DLC costs.

city.description: The city for the addresses, for example Los Angeles.

state.description: The state for the addresses, for example California.

entityType.description: Legal structure or form a company takes

stockExchange.description: Marketplace where stocks, bonds, etc... are bought and sold

taxNumber.description: Business Id that corresponds to your business

termsAndConditionsAccepted.description: Whether the terms and conditions have been accepted

CampaignAttachment.description: A File Attachment for a 10DLC CampaignBrief

type.description:
Attachment type describing the purpose of the attachment
e.g. 'callToAction', 'termsOfService'

fileName.description:
The name of the file being attached
e.g. 'myFile01'

fileType.description:
The type of file being attached
e.g. 'pdf', 'jpg', 'png'

fileContentBase64.description: File content as base 64 encoded string

CampaignAttachments.description: A wrapper for a list of 10DLC CampaignAttachment entities.

nextLink.description: Represents the URL link to the next page.

CampaignAttachmentSummary.description: A summary of 10DLC Campaign Brief File Attachment data

type.description:
Attachment type describing the purpose of the attachment
e.g. 'callToAction', 'termsOfService'

fileName.description:
The name of the attached file
e.g. 'myFile01'

callToAction.description: Call to action text. To be provided when InteractiveVoiceResponse is specified as call to action type

description.description: Describes how and why the number will be used for messaging as part of the program.

termsAndConditionsUrl.description: URL to the terms and conditions

ContactInformation.description: Represent contact information for the brand.

phone.description: Contact phone number for the authorized user for the customer. Use E164 format. e.g. +14086111111

email.description: Contact email for the authorized user for the customer

emailForVerification.description: Email used for two factor authentication.

MessageDetails.description: Compiles details describing how the messaging campaign will work, for example whether opt-in and opt-out will be required and how will the messages for those actions look like.

helpAnswerToUserRequired.description: Boolean to determine if HelpAnswerToUser is required

helpAnswerToUser.description:
Message text for mobile terminated message associated with HELP keyword
e.g 'This is the HELP message test.'.

optOutAnswerToUserRequired.description: Boolean to determine if optOutAnswerToUser is required

optOutAnswerToUser.description:
"Message text for mobile terminated message associated with STOP keyword
e.g. 'This is the STOP message test.'.

optInMessageToUserRequired.description: Boolean to determine if optInMessage is required

hasEmbeddedLink.description: Indicates whether the message has an embedded link.

hasEmbeddedPhone.description: Indicates whether the message has an embedded phone number.

termsAndConditionsAccepted.description: Indicates whether the terms and conditions have been accepted.

hasAgeGatedContent.description: Indicates whether the message contains age-gated content.

hasDirectLending.description: Indicates whether the message involves direct lending.

ReviewNote.description: Holds a note about a Program Brief that has gone thru stages of review process.

message.description: Note related to a Brand or Campaign that may imply changes needed from the client.

date.description: Date and time when the note was added to the Brand or Campaign.

TenDlcConfigurationRequest.description: The 10DLC configuration of a purchased phone number.

sms.description: The phone number SMS capability type.

tenDlcCampaignId.description: The 10DLC campaign ID associated with the phone number.

TenDlcConfigurationResponse.description: The 10DLC configuration of a purchased phone number.

sms.description: The phone number SMS capability type.

tenDlcCampaignId.description: The 10DLC campaign ID associated with the phone number.

TenDlcCost.description: The cost of a 10DLC Brand or Campaign

currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code for the cost amount, e.g. USD.

countryCode.description: The ISO 3166-2 code of the phone number's country, e.g. US.

billingFrequency.description: The frequency with which the cost gets billed.

TenDlcCosts.description: A wrapper for a list of 10DLC cost entities

nextLink.description: Represents the URL link to the next page of local 10DLC costs results.

USBrand.description: Represents a US 10DLC brand with details and status information.

id.description: Unique identifier that corresponds to a brand

statusUpdatedDate.description: Last date and time when the 10DLC status was updated

costs.description: Represents the costs tied to the brand

submissionDate.description: Date and time when the 10DLC was submitted

reviewNotes.description:
Notes added to the 10DLC Brand after being reviewed to help customer understand
review results and necessary follow up actions.

id.description: Unique identifier that corresponds to a campaign

brandId.description: Unique identifier that corresponds to a brand

statusUpdatedDate.description: Last date and time when the 10DLC status was updated

costs.description: Represents the costs tied to the campaign

submissionDate.description: Date and time when the 10DLC was submitted

reviewNotes.description:
Notes added to the 10DLC Campaign after being reviewed to help customer understand
review results and necessary follow up actions.

phoneNumberCount.description: Count of local phone numbers currently associated to the 10DLC Campaign.

attachments.description: A list of summarized data of attachments currently added to the 10DLC Campaign

UseCase.description: Compiles information describing the user case for a 10DLC messaging campaign.

sampleMessages.description: Sample messages that a user might send, as a proof of concept

USBrands.description: A wrapper for a list of USBrands.

nextLink.description: Represents the URL link to the next page

USCampaigns.description: A wrapper for a list of USCampaigns

nextLink.description: Represents the URL link to the next page

details.description: Further details about specific errors that led to this error.
